sections.heading: for irrigation; declared natural want
sections.text: Water for the purposes of irrigation in the State of Nebraska is hereby declared to be a natural want.SourceLaws 1895, c. 69, § 65, p. 268;R.S.1913, § 3369;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. VII, art. V, div. 1, § 1, p. 831;C.S.1922, § 8406;C.S.1929, § 46-501;R.S.1943, § 4
